Corona Municipal Airport Lease Extension Act
To require the Secretary of the Army to treat the lease of land for operations of the Corona Municipal Airport as a valid lease for the purposes of renewing such lease, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Corona Municipal Airport Lease Extension Act
This bill requires the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers (USACE) to treat the City of Corona, California's lease to operate the Corona Municipal Airport as a valid water resource development project lease for the purpose of renewal.
The Corona Municipal Airport is located within the Prado Flood Control Basin Project Area. The City of Corona operates the airport and leases the land from the USACE.
